channel.title: [RS2][SRL] Canadian's Talker
channel.description:
Well, this is my first script here. I think I might take up scripting. ^^ Anyway, this talker has a few cool things.
1. It stops when you get a trade. 2. Explains what to do, and how to change the delay.
I used a tutorial when I got stuck, but it's completely scripted by me.
Please, don't call this a noob script. You wouldn't think an eleven year old could do this, would you?

item.title: [RS2][SRL] Canadian's Talker
item.dc:creator: @omg_omg_omg omg omg omg
item.description:
@omg_omg_omg wrote:

No-one gets many replies. =[br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2007, 12:16:58 AM[/size][hr]Oh, I’ve just taken a look at your script, (something I should have done a long time ago) and realized that you don’t have random wait times. Instead of modifying it for you, (which I don’t think I should have been doing) I’ll just let you do that on your own. Cause I didn’t need people to modify scripts for me when they didn’t work, (if I did, I probably wouldn’t have learned how to fix certain things) so I’m sure that you can handle it as well. Send me a message if you need help.

Read full topic
